resultObject.title: Mara Camping / ATC Liptovský Trnovec
resultObject.description:
Mara CAMPING ATC LIPTOVSKÝ TRNOVEC is situated on the bank of the dam Liptovská Mara, which is the biggest water dam in Slovakia. This place is favorite for lovers of the water and outdoor sports. Liptovská Mara offers ideal conditions for yachting and windsurfing, with possibility of fishing, sightseeing ship, mountain bike routes, hiking and many more exciting trips (paragliding, heritage of UNESCO, castles, open air museums, galleries).

The camping is 6 km far from the Liptovský Mikuláš city. The camp is opened from 1st May till 30st September.
has cca 38 000 m2 and offers accommodation in cottages, places for caravans and camping up to 1000 persons, sanitary facilities and sport grounds.

Whole area is closed, fenced and secured by camera system and security service 24 /7. Entrance into the camping have just billeted. There is a Wi-Fi disposable for free in whole camping, then washmashine, grocery and sport equipment rental.

There are also ski resort (Salamandra resort 900 m), aquapark (Vodný raj Vyhne 15km) and an old mining town (Banská Štiavnica 5 km) not far from this area.

resultObject.title: ATC Račková dolina
resultObject.description: Car-camp (CC) is situated 4 km from the village Pribylina in touristically attractive and unusually beautiful environment near the entrance into Račková and Jamnická valleys. Visitors are provided with ideal conditions for walks and more demanding hikes into the hills and valleys of Západné Tatry. For able-bodied visitors, Vysoké Tatry are rather nearby so they can take high-mountain hikes there. Lovers of cycling will certainly appreciate the beauty of the surroundings, they can rent bicycles just in the site of CC. In summer, this area, together with Račková and Jamnická valleys, offers wide range of possibilities for hikers and also for cyclers; in winter it is cross-country or downhill skiing.

resultObject.title: Route E58 - Camp Košice
resultObject.description:
Novo zrekonštruovaný Route E58-Camp Košice je jediným campom nachádzajúcim sa v Košiciach. Veľkým benefitom nášho campu je jeho poloha, nakoľko sa nachádza necelé 4km od centra mesta a železničnej stanice a taktiež možno spomenúť aj bezprostrednú blízkosť medzinárodného letiska. 
V campe  je možné využiť voľné trávnaté plochy pre váš stan alebo karavan, ubytovanie v piatich dvojizbových chatkách s kapacitou pre 5 ľudí, v dvoch mobilných domoch standard pre dve osoby a jednom mobilnom dome premium pre 4 osoby s možnosťou prístelky a taktiež sa v ponuke nachádza aj apartmán pre 4 osoby. 
V areáli campu je pre návštevníkov k dispozícii: recepcia, ktorá je v letnej sezóne otvorená nepretržite počas dňa a mimo letnej sezóny od 19:00-21:00, sociálne zariadenia, sprchy s teplou vodou, kuchynka, bufet, detské ihrisko, pingpongový stôl a ohniska s možnosťou zakúpiť si drevo. V celom areáli je možné pripojenie na wifi.

resultObject.title: Camping & Glamping Slovakia
resultObject.description:
Camping is no longer about roughing it at Camping & Glamping Slovakia. Get away from crowd, into the wild, enjoy the peace, tranquility and privacy of this secluded place, experience vacation under the canvas, close to the nature and enjoy the luxury and contemporary comforts anyway. While glamping, you stay at already built up large, fully and aesthetically furnished tent with an comfortable bed, cotton sheets, lounge, lighting and electricity. Glamping is for people who love nature, but would like to avoid the hassle of camping.
There is nothing more relaxing than enjoying a secluded glamping getaway.

resultObject.title: Banský dvor
resultObject.description:
Banský dvor ponúka komfort pre všetkých hostí, ubytovaných, kempujúcich. Na trávnatých plochách sú umiestnené altánky a murované ohniská pre spoločné posedenia, v motocampe je vybudovaný prístrešok pre motorky, v priestore pre karavany sú pripravené elektro prípojky. Sociálne priestory spĺňajú náročné kritériá pre hygienu.
  Pre tých, ktorí pred stanmi uprednostňujú pohodlie postele, pripravujeme  štvorposteľové chatky, vybavené sprchovacím kútom, WC, chladničkou.  Chatky sú vykurované a preto je ich využitie možné po celý rok. Celý areál je pokrytý WiFi pripojením.

resultObject.title: Autokemp AQAURUTHENIA
resultObject.description:
Kemp sa nachádza vedla Aquaparku AQAURUTHENIA, preto z kempu to budete mať iba na skok k bazénom a letným atrakciám..
V Aquaparku je letné a kryté kúpalisko, letné atrakcie a aktivity.

V kempu ubytujeme skautov i neskautov, nočných spáčov a cestovateľov, máme miestá pre vlastné stany a karavany s el.prípojkou.

Okrem nezabudnuteľnej noci pod širákom a nočnou oblohou, sa vaše dopravné prostriedky i ubytovacie prístrešky ocitnú v bezprostrednej blízkosti pravého indiánskeho típí. Vsúpte! A sami uvidíte.
Náš kemp / autokemp je pre vás k dispozícii počas celej letnej sezóny.

resultObject.title: Thermal ECO camping LEO
resultObject.description:
V kúpeľnom mestečku Dudince, vo vzdialenosti 300 metrov od termálneho kúpaliska Dudinka, nájdete príjemné ubytovanie EKO Penzión a Kemping LEO. Poskytujeme okrem ubytovania svojim klientom aj kvalitné služby reštaurácie a baru s ponukou celodenného stravovania. Lahodné jedlá domácej kuchyne si hostia môžu vychutnať aj na krytej vonkajšej terase s posedením.

V Kempingu LEO na trávnatom priestore s rozlohou 30 árov je možné stanovať a odstaviť je tu možné až  10 karavanov. Samozrejmé je pripojenie na vodu a elektrinu a na bezplatné WiFi .

V okolí sa nachádza veľa turistických a cyklistických tras, v Kúpeľoch Dudince je možné využiť rehabilitačné procedúry a k dispozícii je aj športové centrum. Športoví nadšenci si môžu zahrať tenis, squash, bowling a biliard.

resultObject.title: Autokemping Tilia Gäceľ
resultObject.description:
Campsite Tília Gäceĺ is located near the town Dolný Kubín, in nice natural environment on the left bank of river Orava. There is restaurant, grassy areas for staying in tents and caravans. Surrounding provides great possibilities for sports and hiking. Camp provides outside mulfi-functional playgroud, children´s playground with slides and grassy football playground. There is available outside swimming pool, external fitness machines and possibility to rent bicycles and scooters.

Slovak championship of canoeing takes place here every year.

resultObject.description: The site of Slnečné jazera (Sun lakes) in Senec is located approximately 25 km from Bratislava. It is one of the best-known recreational sites with the possibility of hiking in Slovakia. Water area of lakes connected into one unit has the extent of 116 ha. The area is divided into southern and northern part. Both parts of the site offer a wide range of hotels, pensions and a lot of catering facilities not only of hotel but also of snack-bar type. Also sportsmen can come into their own thanks to the number of sporting possibilities (volleyball and tennis courts, playgrounds for children, sports equipment lending office - boats, water bicycles, tobogans, ...). In the northern part, there is a tent-camp with capacity of 900 spots, and Aquapark. In the southern part, there is a caravan camp with capacity of 200 spots, and bungalows.

The site Hôrka is typical with its sandy and gravel-sandy beaches, there is a wide range of services, cultural and sporting activities that you can enjoy. In site Hôrka, there is Hipocentrum that offers lessons of horse-riding. Hôrka is the best-equipped car-camping in Zemplínska Šírava, with kitchenettes, gas stoves and kitchen units - showers with hot water in calm environment in the forestpark valley Vysoká Hôrka.

resultObject.title: Camping park Karpaty
resultObject.description:
Camping Park Karpaty is situated above the village Kuchyňa, at the western foothills of Malé Karpaty (Small Carpathians) on the border of the Protected Landscape Area of Malé Karpaty. The village Kuchyňa is located in the district Malacky in the Bratislava region, 43 km from the Slovak capital, Bratislava.

The area in the immediate vicinity of the Camping Park Karpaty consists of deep forests with massive broadleaved and conifer trees. The scenery of untouched nature is completed by the water reservoir Kuchyňa.
